doc.title: Dam Shel Kash, Lev Shel Even
doc.plot: The personal journey to Holland, the homeland of Shmuel Hacohen, a 72-year-old holocaust survivor living in Israel. He has one mission - to refute the myth concerning the 'good people of Holland' who 'helped' and 'saved' many Jews during WWII. Yehuda Kaveh's new film presents a disenchanted view of Holland as party to the Nazi annihilation machine.
